timestamp.description: The start date and time of the observation in UTC.

isComplete.description: Flag that indicates if the observation is complete. For daily observations this flag is complete if the value is based on a full day of observations. If not all observations have been received the value will be false.

unit.description: The unit of the duration, UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of duration.

valueType.description: The type of the observation values.
